statements: SELECT * FROM TelehealthServiceData;
SELECT record_id, patient_id, service_date, billing_amount FROM TelehealthServiceData;
SELECT hospital_name, doctor_name FROM TelehealthServiceData WHERE service_type='Consultation';
SELECT * FROM TelehealthServiceData WHERE billing_amount > 100.00;
SELECT doctor_name, service_date, billing_amount FROM TelehealthServiceData ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TelehealthServiceData WHERE service_type='Consultation' ORDER BY service_date DESC
SELECT doctor_name, hospital_name, billing_amount FROM TelehealthServiceData WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY service_date ASC
SELECT service_date, service_type, billing_amount, doctor_name FROM TelehealthServiceData WHERE hospital_name='ABC Hospital' ORDER BY billing_amount DESC

SELECT record_id, patient_id, service_date, service_type, doctor_name, hospital_name, billing_amount FROM TelehealthServiceData WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY service_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM TelehealthServiceData WHERE doctor_name='Dr. Smith' AND hospital_name='XYZ Hospital' ORDER BY billing_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM telehealth_services;
SELECT service_name, provider_name, service_cost FROM telehealth_services;
SELECT service_name, service_date FROM telehealth_services WHERE service_cost > 100;
SELECT * FROM telehealth_services ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) AS num_services FROM telehealth_services GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT * FROM telehealth_services WHERE service_cost > 1000;
SELECT service_name, provider_name, service_cost FROM telehealth_services ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_records WHERE patient_age > 30 AND patient_gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM telehealth_services JOIN patient_records ON telehealth_services.service_id = patient_records.service_id;
SELECT provider_name, COUNT(*) AS service_count FROM telehealth_services GROUP BY provider_name;
SELECT * FROM telehealth_data_source;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM telehealth_data_source ORDER BY source_type DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_data WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, appointment_date, appointment_notes FROM appointment_data WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date ASC;
SELECT record_id, medical_condition, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE medical_condition LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM telehealth_data_source
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM telehealth_data_source ORDER BY source_name DESC
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM patient_data WHERE patient_age > 30
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_notes FROM appointment_data WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT patient_id, medical_condition, prescription FROM medical_records
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM patients;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, experience_years FROM doctors WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT appointment_date, reason_for_visit FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, appointment_date FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id WHERE appointments.doctor_id = 3;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' AND experience_years > 5 ORDER BY experience_years DESC;

SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, appointment_date, reason_for_visit FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id WHERE patients.patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, prescription FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%' OR diagnosis LIKE '%Tumor%';
SELECT * FROM Telehealth_Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, patient_gender FROM Telehealth_Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Telehealth_Providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time FROM Telehealth_Appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT billing_amount, billing_status FROM Telehealth_Billing WHERE billing_status = 'PAID';
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, appointment_type FROM Telehealth_Appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM Telehealth_Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT provider_name, provider_specialty FROM Telehealth_Providers WHERE provider_specialty = 'Cardiology'
SELECT report_text FROM Telehealth_Reports WHERE report_date = '2022-02-20' AND report_id IN (SELECT appointment_id FROM Telehealth_Appointments WHERE appointment_type = 'Follow-up')
SELECT billing_id, billing_amount, billing_status FROM Telehealth_Billing ORDER BY billing_amount DESC, billing_status
